title: Fau
typeOfFood: Vegan, Organic, Western, Bakery, European, German
description: Vegan cafe serving organic breakfast, brunch, sandwiches, soups, and desserts, since early-2013. Coffee and tea served with choice of plant milk. Cupcakes, nutcakes and other desserts rotate daily. Lunch offerings are posted weekly on its facebook. Small reading area with cookbooks.
